sentences.en: He is on the varsity in tennis.
sentences.cn: 他是大学队的网球选手.

sentences.en: I watched her through junior high and high school. Every week , she led her varsity.
sentences.cn: 在她高中的时候,有一天,我看见她坐在草地上, 头埋在臂弯里.

sentences.en: In high school, I played varsity football.
sentences.cn: 上中学的时候, 我是校橄榄球队的主力.

sentences.en: Noel: So, you swam for your varsity team in college?
sentences.cn: 诺尔: 那么你曾是大学游泳队的成员啰?

sentences.en: Our varsity swimmer began looking into new adventure as soon and the swim season ended.
sentences.cn: 游泳赛季刚一结束,学校的游泳队员就开始新的智慧征途.

sentences.en: Shaun McCalister also played for the varsity basketball team.
sentences.cn: 肖恩·麦卡利斯特也为校篮球队效过力。

sentences.en: She has been in the playoffs every year since she made the varsity.
sentences.cn: 自从加入校队后，她每年都能参加季后赛。

sentences.en: She says that varsity the diversity of the teams and players will appear appeal to viewers.
sentences.cn: 她说队伍和队员的差异性将吸引观众.

sentences.en: That's the third time the varsity team appeared on television this season.
sentences.cn: 那是我们校队本季第三次在电视上出现.

sentences.en: What is the varsity boys'basketball team's reco in district play?
sentences.cn: 在社区赛中大学男子篮球队的纪录是多少?

sentences.en: When I got cut from the varsity a sophomore in high school, I learned something.
sentences.cn: 当我高二从校队里被刷下来时, 我懂得了一些东西.

trans.tran_cn: （常用于牛津和剑桥两大学的体育比赛）大学的
大学（尤指牛津或剑桥），（学校的）代表队
trans.tran_en: the main team that represents a university, college, or school in a sport
